page.title: 09Doctors and Health Clinics
page.content: {Doctors-Group Practice: {Drs Swales ,Wyatt & McMahon Surgery hours_ morning and evening Dispensary at surgery (no village chemist) 2/3 receptionists,3/4 nurses & midwife {Health Visitor}_ Mrs Revill Separate centre for the Health Visitor { {Services available in Misterton:} Well Woman Clinic e.g. smear test Family Planning Clinic Blood pressure check without appointment _Monday Vaccination service Baby clinic each Monday, with Doctor in attendance fortnightly. Full pre-natal clinic & service ie. lectures,advice,visits to hospitals Mother and Baby group meetings.
